section.section: Except as otherwise provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a county health officer or a designee of a county health officer may issue a civil citation to a person who violates any provision of this title.
In Cecil County, only a sworn law enforcement officer may issue a civil citation to a person who violates any provision of this title.

text.section: The county health officer or sworn law enforcement officer shall retain a copy of the citation.
